Also, when I click the button to take a picture there seems to be a delay so unless the subject is a still life the photo has to be redone.

Reviews.Title: perfect pocket camera
Reviews.Author: yolanda bolda
Reviews.Content: compact, easy to use, takes great pictures, the zoom is great. love it. it fits in your pocket so you can take it with youwherever you go

Reviews.Title: The lens got jammed after only a few uses.
Reviews.Author: Elena Ralston
Reviews.Content: Unreliable performance - a lens got jammed only after a few uses. I'm returning it ASAP. Would not recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great to work with these folks.
Reviews.Author: Freedom
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted!  Perfect!  Fast shipper, well packaged.  Now I get to play with my new toy this weekend.  Did lots of research online prior to selecting this camera.

Reviews.Title: Nikon is always my favorite.
Reviews.Author: gypsrose
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the cost.  I got it for use at school and the students love it, too.  Good buy

Reviews.Title: Great small camera
Reviews.Author: ANA
Reviews.Content: This camera is the perfect size to throw in a purse and take for dinner or a night out but it is very finicky on lighting.  The pictures are often over exposed if the flash is needed and generally struggles in low light.  If you can get the lighting right, the pictures are great.  I love the video capacity, it has a fairly good sound quality and is a quick switch from picture mode to capture the moment!

Reviews.Title: dead pixels in video, braking sound
Reviews.Author: Vadim Parfilko
Reviews.Content: I had few Items of this model.All has some problem with video: dead pixels, which is not appears in photo, braking sound

Reviews.Title: power button didn't work well
Reviews.Author: FishFishFish
Reviews.Content: i didnt own this camera very long, as out of the box it had a problem with the power button. you had to press it sometimes 2 or 3 times before the camera turned on. i cant speak to the technical features of the camera, as i only used it for a couple days before i decided that the power button problem was too much a problem to merit keeping the camera. what if you see something you want to take a picture of and have to do it quickly - you don't want to have to press the button repeatedly just hoping one of the times it will turn on. could be that i just ended up with a lemon.

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix camera
Reviews.Author: Jane E. Colson
Reviews.Content: love this camera. ,right size and fit for my purse. takes great pictures and is easy to change for inside to outside. arrived in a timely manner. love the fact that you plug it in to get the battery charged.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S6300
Reviews.Author: Marvin Williams
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for wife as a birthday present.She take's this camera everywhere.It takes amazing photos and its really compact.My wife love's it.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Bad purchase; especially in lowlight, with movement
Reviews.Author: GFmomoftwo
Reviews.Content: Waited an entire year of using this camera before I posted a review.  This camera is awful, especially in low light or with any movement (ie. taking pictures of children).  Most pics are blurry and despite having a professional play around with the settings, couldn't get the camera to function well.  DO NOT BUY!  I am going back to Canon.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Zoraibet Dagher
Reviews.Content: 100% fulfilled my expectation. Excellent quality, I can confidently recommend that the product is equal to that offered by the seller

Reviews.Title: The Nikon Coolpix S6300 - A Great Little Camera For People On The Go
Reviews.Author: J. Crippen "John Crippen"
Reviews.Content: I usually shoot with my Nikon D80 or D7000, but there's times when lugging around a large camera bad is not feasible. This little point and shoot was perfect for taking quick snaps both indoors and outdoors. The flash is pretty intuitive for such an inexpensive camera and I was actually able to take nice shots of the inside of a PC tower with no problems. The pictures came out great on the first try. The video quality and sound were surprisingly nice as well. Unfortunately mine was stolen and I replaced it with the Nikon Coolpix 3500. Although the Mega Pixels are higher on the new camera, the images are no where near the quality of the S6300 and the body is not as rugged. I'd recommend the Coolpix S6300 for everything from on the fly editorials to just having a fun time. It'd make a great stocking stuffer, too!Cameras for Kids: Fun and Inexpensive Projects for the Little PhotographerAnimal Portraits With The Digital Photography Of John CrippenScenic Photography Using Examples From The California Central Coast

Reviews.Title: Great camera for fast work.
Reviews.Author: Greg Parkinson
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality photos for close up, medium and long distance views held in a shirt pocket.  It is reliable and does excellent work.

Reviews.Title: We like this camera a lot!
Reviews.Author: Mark Saltpaw
Reviews.Content: This camera is great! Takes awesome pictures and is so easy to carry around in your pocket. My wife and I took a trip recently to NYC, and had a great time taking pictures and was not hampered a bit by some bulky and larger cameras.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix is indeed cool.
Reviews.Author: Antonio L. Patton
Reviews.Content: This camera takes amazing pictures I used in London, Paris and Las Vegas this year and was really impressed.  The software that comes included is also awesome and pretty easy to figure out.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Pammysue
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera and had way more options then I knew it did! I was very pleased with this camera!

Reviews.Title: Nikon CoolP 16 mp is a great affordable purse camera to have handy
Reviews.Author: mike acosta
Reviews.Content: the Nikon Coolpix is a quick to have in hand camera that will work in a pinch. As far a pocket digital cameras go you can go wrong here, the compact size and quick speed to boot up make it readily available for that instant pic you need to take

Reviews.Title: This is a fantastic camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: JOHN HURLEY
Reviews.Content: It is compact and takes excellent pics. I even got one for my nephew and his gf because they just had a new baby and I wanted pics there were not from a cell phone

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Emmysue
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my Europe trip this past summer because the only camera I use is my iphone, which doesn't take great pics at night or indoors.  This camera was very slow to take pictures.  The battery died quickly after it was fully charged.  The most annoying thing about this camera was that if the camera died while it was on and the lens was out, the lens didn't automatically retract and then it wouldn't fit back in my clutch... super annoying when you're out at a club/bar at night.  I returned this as soon as I got back from my trip.

Reviews.Title: Almost a pro, in a pocket sized camera
Reviews.Author: Joseph H. Warren "dr joe in california"
Reviews.Content: Primarily used as an underwater camera (with an Ikelite case), the camera takes very sharp pictures, and is naturally wide angle.  No complaints with operation, durability, focus ability, or lighting.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Robert Faulkner
Reviews.Content: Great, works as expected, I have an older model and wanted a new one for my wife, she is a teacher.

Reviews.Title: Good Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: J. Teague "Hiker / Amateur Photographer / Sha...
Reviews.Content: This is a good basic camera - nothing fancy.  It powers on quickly, and focuses pretty quick.  If you turn on too many features (smile detect, etc) it will drastically slow down focusing.  Only use those features for an organized group photo!  It certainly doesn't replace the DSLR for quality or speed.  My 6MP D50 makes a better pic, as it should, but this is very handy to carry around, and will easily fit in a shirt pocket.

Reviews.Title: Cool Pix
Reviews.Author: Alice Bowles
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! It is just point and click. I took it on my recent trip to Italy and got fantastic pictures, even on the moving tour bus!

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip to Punta Cana and it really took some fabulous photos.  It's easy to use and the pictures came out clear.

Reviews.Title: Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: Robin Dimiceli "Mortgage Business Owner"
Reviews.Content: So easy, takes great pics.. has a button to switch to movie mode in an instant!!  Pics that look professional and all you do is aim and shoot :) Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: For a quick and affordable camera, this one works great with great picture/video quality. It's responsiveness and battery life are also excellent

Reviews.Title: Pictures are not always sharp even with different settings.
Reviews.Author: jmford4
Reviews.Content: I would not buy this camera again. I had the Kodak EasyShare which took clear, crisp pictures but I decided it was time to update my camera. I bought the Coolpix for price and the good reviews. With this camera I cannot depend on my pictures to be sharp. I have tried many settings but I still get blurry pictures a lot of the time. I know I don't have the steadiest hand but I don't noticeably shake. I have to take several pictures of my subject to make sure I get at least one acceptable picture.

Reviews.Title: Bit Shoddy in the construction.
Reviews.Author: Lorraine Quesada
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace an earlier model of the same camera. The battery/card compartment wants to unlatch, be aware that when you do open it the battery latch is probably going to open as well and dump your battery on the floor. The spring mechanism for the card is also shall we say bouncy-the first time I ejected my card it popped up and out about 3 feet like toast in a cartoon!!!Having more megapixels doesn't necessarily mean having a better picture-the old model took much better macro and video. Will not buy this brand again-back to Fuji for me.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Larry Case
Reviews.Content: Used on Our cruise and the pictures came out great, the 1080 HD video was better than my video camera.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S6300
Reviews.Author: Kay Hansen
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It's everything I hoped it would be.  Just what I wanted! Small enough to fit in my purse and takes awesome pics!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Ruth
Reviews.Content: Ordered this camera to replace the one I dropped...  It is easy to configure and takes great photos.  Easy to flip between standard and video too.  Good buy!

Reviews.Title: Love my new Nikon
Reviews.Author: Suzanne E. Theisen
Reviews.Content: Great pictures and easy to use. Love the color and the thin nature of the camera. Pictures are extremely clear.

Reviews.Title: easy to operate takes great pictures!
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Bunker
Reviews.Content: I had been looking for a camera which was easy to handle and take clear sharp photos . this camera is perfect for me. It is easy to operate and I couldn't be happier. glad I bought it!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Beverly Ince
Reviews.Content: Love the camera so far, not really a true blue like photo but was pretty anyway. Havent used it but a few times but so far so good. Your delivery was speedy .

Reviews.Title: thanks
Reviews.Author: Pressley Sanders
Reviews.Content: Thanks so much, great deal, i took it on vacation with us to St. Thomas VI and the pictures look great.

Reviews.Title: learning as I go... but it's all good.......
Reviews.Author: bendinroad
Reviews.Content: Had to spend some time learning the particulars of this camera and it's settings but I am moving forward and taking good pictures. I am an online seller and this is my first new camera in many years...

Reviews.Title: Exellent little camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a great light weight camera. You have to fiddle with the settings a bit to get the best possible image in every situation, but I have made photos of fast moving objects, skylines in the night, fireworks, close-ups, and they all came out very well. I have used these pictures for websites, powerpoint presentations, and printed them and found no complaints about the quality. I wish it had come with a separate charger and a replacement battery, but for the price it was okay, and you can get both for a small price, for example from eForce city. The color is a lovely blue (definitly not purple, I think the people who wrote that got the wrong camera). Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: GG from NY
Reviews.Author: Erodriguez
Reviews.Content: This camera is excellent in quality, looks, etc. I just wish I would have waited one week before buying it because in a later email from Amazon it was listed around $20.00 less.

Reviews.Title: S6300 is an ok digital camera
Reviews.Author: Eric Medley
Reviews.Content: I don't know much about cameras.This camera was similar to my Nikon s4300 except for no touchscreen, but a lot more features.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: SugarB "Sharon Berman"
Reviews.Content: I love my Nikon camera.  The price was great and the quality is outstanding.  I have had other Nikon cameras and each one is better then the last and buying from amazon is always the best price and they back their products.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix is my favorite point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Katy Korkos
Reviews.Content: I had one of these years ago, then when it finally broke after I dropped it for the millionth time, I thought that, since all point and shoots were exactly alike I would just get a Canon to replace it. Then the Canon broke, and I couldn't wait to go back to Nikon. I like the scene menu better- it's easier to see with old eyes and to switch when there's a glare in the foreground (snow) or when I want a longer exposure (night landscape)

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: happilyretired
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for all the bells and whistles then don't buy this. I bought it for my aging mother who just wanted to point and shoot. Works great for her and the pictures are of a nice quality.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Jordan Swartzendruber
Reviews.Content: I ordered this online, and was a little suspicious because it was refurbished, but I have not run into any problems. The camera was delivered quickly, with all the amenities mentioned in the description, in perfect condition. Functions well for all types of casual photography.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly good!
Reviews.Author: Patricia Nelson "SISTERS"
Reviews.Content: Not only Is this a very nice looking camera, it's very easy to work! You'll also be very surprised on how nice the pictures come out. It's worth Every penny. So come on now one on you won't regret it!

Reviews.Title: very happy w Amazon.
Reviews.Author: Shirley A Yarbrough
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for a stolen Nikon and I am pleased with it and Amazon's quick delivery.  Amazon always delivers good products and service.  Also bought my Kindle Fire from Amazon and their tech support is very good.

Reviews.Title: Great new camera for my wie
Reviews.Author: Laureano B. Angel
Reviews.Content: My wife absolutely loves this camera.  It is user friendly for her and loves the features like the Panoramic option and the high megapixels and 10x zoom.  Plus Nikon makes great products.

Reviews.Title: Just a camera
Reviews.Author: Verla Seibel "okie"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband for Fathers day , he has it with him at most times , we farm and he likes to get interesting pictures , but this camera is not anything special , just ok  , wished I had looked a little more for a better camera , for the money it is nothing special.

Reviews.Title: Simple, Easy and with great resolution.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It is a simple camera to take simple pictures easily. In addition, it comes with a great video resolution. Does the job fine.

Reviews.Title: Handy camera
Reviews.Author: Tatek Samare Zarou
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for a similar one that got damaged when sand got into the lens but this one has Full HD movie. Great camera that takes very good pictures. Great buy.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Rhonda
Reviews.Content: Okay camera with all the features of a small, pocket size camera.  Good quality pictures.  Every once in awhile, the camera won't turn off or on, so I have to open the battery compartment, release the battery and put it back, then it works again (while it's a fully charged battery).

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and getting better pictures.
Reviews.Author: Dorthy Wiles
Reviews.Content: So far it is all right, have not had much time to examine the various features. Better than the camera I already owned.

Reviews.Title: This Coolpix s6300 works great for my intended purpose
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a good overall point and shoot camera that is quick to grab when needed, takes great photos, and is easy to use, I recommend this camera.  It is good in low light and is fairly simple to operate.  What sold me on this camera was that it has the 10x optical which for a pocket size camera is just what I was looking for.  I go for lots of walks and wanted something I could slip in my pocket and take with.  Works great for this.  Does great on overall landscape, people, and overall images.  The downfall with this camera seems to be that it takes too long to do a preview of the photo that you just shot.  I haven't found a way to turn this off yet so it could just be me having the issue.  It hinders my ability to take multiple shots in a row.  All in all though, it is a good camera.

Reviews.Title: A nice choice @ great price
Reviews.Author: png cheesehead
Reviews.Content: The s6300 has been replaced by a model that uses wifi. I don't need that, so this is the perfect choice for me. Great quality of pictures and it it easy to use (intuitive).

Reviews.Title: Battery Exhausted Message
Reviews.Author: Rakesh
Reviews.Content: Got a refurbished s6300 charged it for full night the when i swtiched on the camera i am getting message  Battery Exhausted,called customer care for a solution they asked me to buy a new battery to solve this issue which is insane ,i have searched for a solution on google and found out that so many nikon cameras having this issue, i would advice people to stay away from this product.(search nikkon Battery Exhausted message on google for more information).

Reviews.Title: New Camera
Reviews.Author: Shirley J. Clark
Reviews.Content: I find it is much harder to get focused on a subject than my old camera.  Pictures seem clearer, and maybe once I have used it more, I will get it adjusted.  I do like the longer range of bringing in my subject.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: pc shopper
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It has a good lithium battery not the AA kind.  That's the main reason i purchased it.  It is refurbished so didn't come with a memory card.  I had plenty of them around the house.  I also had the case from my last camera.  Going refurbished is a way to get a great bargain.!!!!

Reviews.Title: I love the camera,  It replaces the old ine that we droppted during vacation.
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Jo
Reviews.Content: Af first the camera didn' turn on.  It required time to fully recharge batter.  After ttan, everytinng is working beatufully.

Reviews.Title: Disappointment
Reviews.Author: Rodney Seepaul
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera only four months ago and without any warning it stopped working. I was so excited when I bought it and for this to happen! I am so upset as I have tried everything possible and it won't power on. Think carefully before purchasing this camera...

Reviews.Title: I CARRY MY OLD AND WIFES NEW COOL PIX WITH US WHENEVER WE GO OUT OF THE wIGWAM!!
Reviews.Author: Dale T.
Reviews.Content: A SUPRFINE CAMERA ESPECIALLY BY A ONE EYED POSTPOLIO SURVIVOR WITH FAR TOO MUCH POUNDAGE ON HIM AND NO ABILITY TO WALK BUT I CARRY MY OLD AND WIFES NEW COOL PIX WITH US WHENEVER WE GO OUT OF THE wIGWAM!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent gift
Reviews.Author: Bustos12
Reviews.Content: Got this for a present to my wife. I received it lightning fast and it's perfect. She loved it and it works amazingly

Reviews.Title: Good!
Reviews.Author: Joanne M.
Reviews.Content: I like the product so far! I still trying to figure out the features of this gadget! Time will tell.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Eric B. Hermann
Reviews.Content: Took it to disney World took 600 photos of the grand daughter over a week only charged battery  once took GREAT PHOTOS !! I Love Nikon

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Alex Levasseur "levy"
Reviews.Content: for a quick point and shoot camera this is great! I've used bigger and bulkier but smaller is easier for me.

Reviews.Title: No problems
Reviews.Author: James Kepple
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for wife. She wanted it for vacation (a cruise). Took pictures and had no problems. She likes it a lot. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Working great so far
Reviews.Author: Becky
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product because it's easy for me to use.  I am by no means a professional photographer, not an electronics guru either.  I have a little bit or experience, more like familiarity with this set up because I had a Nikon in the past.  It gets the job done and gets the job done well.  I am so excited to have a camera that works well to capture those moments again!

Reviews.Title: Nikon fun.
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: I needed to replace my camera with one that was compact and versatile, the Coolpix fit the bill.  Not a bulky hard to travel with camera small, great resolution and ease of use with 1080p capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: Gave this as a gift and she loves it!  Says it's a very good camera and she is totally happy with it. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Good vlogging camera for the price
Reviews.Author: JamieDaily
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for vlogging.  We have a lot of family and friends who live far away, so I decided to share some of our lives through video.  That being said, most vloggers use Canon Powershot cameras.  I chose this Nikon because of the full HD settings, and true to Nikon form, the colors are incredible!  I gave it a four out of five because I don't believe it has a stabilizing feature, which when shooting hand held footage, this is difficult.  Also, the autofocus while in video mode is pretty picky.I'm not a fan of the photos.  It always looks a bit off.  The colors and exposure are always unnatural, and even when I try to correct in photoshop, I can never get the look I want.  Let's be honest, I would much rather use my DSLR for photos.  If you're looking for a point and shoot photo camera, this might not be your best buy.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: E. Mills "frugal shopper"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after much research, deciding that it was the best option for what I wanted to do (basic, flexible point-and-shoot with plenty of zoom).  So far it seems that the pictures have nice resolution and I have been pleased with the results in a variety of situations.  I can't tell if it's a function of the on-camera screen or the way the pictures are being taken, but in some of the pictures the color balance seems a bit off.  When taking pictures in a museum, I found it necessary to turn the "exposure" way way down so that the pictures wouldn't look super washed out (I was not using flash to avoid reflection on the exhibit cases).  Sometimes the antishake doesn't seem to work as well as my old camera (a Panasonic Lumix from 2009).  So overall, I'm not overawed by it but it seems to be performing reasonably well.  I hope it doesn't break soon, as it seems that may be the biggest downside to this camera (and I've heard consistently terrible things about Nikon's customer service).

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Carol Garritson
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera and has really nice focal details.  This is exactly what I need for my friends, family, and garden.

Reviews.Title: Cool Little Camera
Reviews.Author: GCS
Reviews.Content: I had one of these cameras but dropped it while it was on. Don't do that, they don't handle it well. So I bought another one just with a higher zoom. The only thing I don't like about the camera is the batteries. The one I broke ran on AA's, this one has rechargeable built in batteries. That it a personal preference.

Reviews.Title: Great outdoor photos
Reviews.Author: Lexi Neese
Reviews.Content: took it out to take pictures of the scenery around town and all the snow that hasn't melted as of yet

Reviews.Title: Gift for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Abby
Reviews.Content: She's needed a new digital camera for some time now and she absolutely loves this one.  It takes beautiful pictures.  The fact that it is red just adds to her love for it.  After all, she is an Ohio State fan, lol.

Reviews.Title: Great small camera.
Reviews.Author: Paul D. Coviello
Reviews.Content: Good small camera for a small price. Easy to carry and the preview screen is good in most light conditions. The picture area in wide angle is great. It will capture a high church facade while you are standing close to it. The zoom is very good too.We used it for a week taking about 50 pictures, and it did not need to be recharged. I added a 64 GB SD card (not included with the camera). It could have been a much smaller SD card but I got confused as I ordered it and got the big one by mistake. I will probably never have to dump the pictures from it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Zoe
Reviews.Content: I could not find my old camera  so I ordered a new one. It arrved on time and it is so cute. I absolutely love it. Funny thing is I then found my old camera, I am still glad I got a new one.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Firechief24
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera for work. It seems to work for the need. The only real issue is it does not focus so well when using up very close to object. Other than that it's not too bad for the price paid.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Ada Wells
Reviews.Content: Love it! Love it! I bought this camera because I got tired of carrying around my Nikon D3000 camera everywhere I went. It takes great picture and videos. I wouldn't trade it for anything. NIKON Products Rules!

Reviews.Title: It is NOT Blue
Reviews.Author: Chrisy Myers
Reviews.Content: The camera seems to be fine though I haven't had a chance to use it much but I thought I had been sent the wrong color. The camera is PURPLE not blue! Nikon doesn't make this camera in "purple" but they need to classify this blue one as purple! Not sure I would have ordered this color had I known it's true color; probably would have went w/ the red one. Maybe the misnamed color is why none of the many stores I checked w/ kept the "blue" one in stock!

Reviews.Title: Great low-lighting, optical zoom, but bad macro
Reviews.Author: Jon MA
Reviews.Content: I decided to try Nikon because of the optical zoom over my Canon ELPH camera that accumulated dust in the sensor.  I like the CMOS sensor and optical zoom on this camera, but the macro is terrible.  I use this camera for work and I could never take closeups of anything low-light or anything reflective like stainless steel.  I started taking my dirty sensor Canon back to work because the macro there was great.  Next camera I'm going for a Canon CMOS sensor ELPH like the 320 or 330 HS.

Reviews.Title: I love my camera :)
Reviews.Author: Mo DeMarco
Reviews.Content: This camera takes some amazing pictures for being a point and shoot!  It's light weight and easy to take anywhere.  The digital zoom on it it actually great too.  I always have problems with digital zoom but on this camera it is not bad at all :)

Reviews.Title: coolpix s6300
Reviews.Author: Missa
Reviews.Content: I pulled it right from the box and it was so easy to set up. the color brilliant can not wait to share with others

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Cathy Novak
Reviews.Content: Love it.  Easy to use and small and easy to carry.  It has a lot of great features and it videos.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: BRENDA S. COTHARY
Reviews.Content: I like all of the options available with the camera (extended zoom, multiple light settings, etc.).  However, I have noticed sometimes the picture is blurry, especially if you are using the zoom.  For the most part the pictures are great quality.  The camera is easy to use and lightweight.

Reviews.Title: Simple to handle, good picture quality
Reviews.Author: California
Reviews.Content: Bought it as a gift for my parents. They loved it. It's not too complicated for them to use. The pictures are good. And it is easy to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: MB
Reviews.Content: Simple to use. Great photo quality! Light weight but solid! A fantastic camera, we would highly recommend this unit to everyone.

Reviews.Title: I just opened it... but it looks great!
Reviews.Author: Gladys Gooseberry "Gladys"
Reviews.Content: I had one of these cameras but stupid me... I got water in the lense... Well anyway... I liked it so much, and my computer is set up for this connection so I knew that I wanted to get another one.  It takes great pictures and movies.  When I took it out of the box it looked new and perfect even though I ordered it used...  I love it... Thanks... <3

Reviews.Title: It was good
Reviews.Author: Nadia
Reviews.Content: I had this camera for over 2 months now and it working fine. I really like it. :) And i am really enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: Great features for a good price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this as a gift for my nephew & his wife as they recently had their fist child and were making pica with their phones. This camera has excellent photo quality for a point and shoot. They are pleased with the photos and the video.Pros: excellent photo quality; hd video; multiple scene and other options; nice size.Cons: not many - the flash location (like most small point & shoots now) takes some getting used to.In general I would definitely recommend this camera for anyone who wants an easy-to-use camera with nice photo and video quality.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Dena Bradley
Reviews.Content: I found these techniques extremely helpful. I was very pleased with the product and how fast it was shipped to me!

Reviews.Title: This camera is awesome for concerts!
Reviews.Author: J. Markes
Reviews.Content: I bought this because of the CMOS sensor and low level light options.  I love it.  When you take pictures it has a wide angle to it which I love.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix s6300 Camera
Reviews.Author: Nettie Brush
Reviews.Content: I like the camera.  Only complaint is the battery doesn't last long enough.  I like that it is small enough to carry in a clutch bag for weddings and social functions.  I would recommend taking charging unit if you are traveling.

Reviews.Title: Suitable Gift
Reviews.Author: Donovan
Reviews.Content: This camera is suitable for amateur photography and video recordings, and as such, makes a suitable gift for some persons.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix 16 MP digital camera
Reviews.Author: Nancy M. Dimitri
Reviews.Content: Very happy with it. Just need to use it more and get used to it. Wanted a camera to be able to hold more photos.

Reviews.Title: Not a must have or a must buy..... its okay
Reviews.Author: Georgia
Reviews.Content: Its not all that. It takes better pictures when you zoom in first and then snap..... but at normal resolution its just okay.

Reviews.Title: Great gift for hubby
Reviews.Author: Jeannette I Stutzman
Reviews.Content: Now every member of our family has a CoolPix camera. My husband bought mine for me a few years ago and I use it tons for my art. I'm a landscape painter who paints on location. It's great to get shots to reference later and also to show a photo of what I was viewing on my web site. My husband wanted to take mine on a golf trip and I wouldn't let him cause I need mine so I had to get him one too! This one has a better zoom and some nice added features like an option for an action/sports shot!

Reviews.Title: Lens is defective, does not open up any longer
Reviews.Author: PAMLA DL JOHNSON
Reviews.Content: I purchased my Nikon COOLPIX S6300 16 MP Digital Camera with 10x Zoom NIKKOR Glass Lens and Full HD 1080p Video (Red) (Electronics) on December 5, 2012 for my daughter as a Christmas 2012 gift;she's 18 and I showed her how to use it, of what she didn't know. She only used it once, on New Years Eve 2012, took one picture and the lens then closed partially. She turned it off and then back on again and from that point on the lens now only opens partially, more like minimally, making it unable to take a picture. Needless to say she was extremely disappointed, this being her first New Year's Eve hanging out at the PeachDrop in Atlanta with her friends.I do not recommend the purchase of this product as I have seen this issue in various other posts discussing the same defect.Terribly dissappointed in this Nikon product!

Reviews.Title: Exellent camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures. Great value. I love that it can be recharged throught the USB port. No need to use the included adapter

Reviews.Title: Yellow or white washed indoor photos
Reviews.Author: Johnny B
Reviews.Content: I've had my Coolpix S6300 for 2 months now and it's a nice fit for my pocket, but only works in the outdoors. The macro mode is not so great and all my indoor photos are yellow tinted without flash or white washed with flash and is very exasperating. I've tried everything and I am now going to buy a Canon like my last one and just keep this in my pocket for the unexpected day to day photos outside.I also don't like the very small and fragile USB connection for charging the battery. The same type of connector was used in my last camera and it did not last long, but I was able to remove the batteries for recharging. I don't know yet if there is an external battery charger when this connector fails. To be on the safe side, I'm very careful when connecting the cable in hopes it will last a little longer before I have to buy another camera when I can no longer charge it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera. I'm delighted with it.
Reviews.Author: harold gibbs
Reviews.Content: This camera is the very best. It has features that are usually found only in cameras costing hundreds of dollars more. Loaded with great functions to make great pictures and make taking good pictures easy and very enjoyable. I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: I needed a small compact camera
Reviews.Author: Clifford J. Plante
Reviews.Content: The quality and ease of use of the Nikon camera is great.  I already have a digital SLR but wanted something a little more compact and this meets that requirement.

Reviews.Title: wrong color
Reviews.Author: Dennis
Reviews.Content: ordered blue....... got purple . The photo shows it as blue. Blue is my daughter's favorite color. Amazon sent a purple camera.

Reviews.Title: CAMARA
Reviews.Author: Lopezronny
Reviews.Content: TODO BIEN EXELENTE EL PRODUCTO ME PARECIO DE CALIDAD Y POR ESO LO COMPRE LA MARCA ME PARECE QUE UNAS DE LAS MEJORES

Reviews.Title: Battery didn't hold up, that was dissapointing
Reviews.Author: Bev
Reviews.Content: We only had the cameral for 6 months with moderate use and the battery went dead on us. Otherwise the pictures are fine, a view finder would be nice!

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A. Bowman
Reviews.Content: The Coolpix camera takes great pictures - they are very sharp and clear.  I received just in time to show off my new baby grandson!

Reviews.Title: My First Camera
Reviews.Author: Larry Gross
Reviews.Content: And it's a honey!  I LOVE IT!I was shocked at how small this camera was, but I haven't owned a camera in over 30 years and times have changed for grandpa here!  LOLThe photo's are very detailed, no blurring at all.  Inside and outside, I haven't noticed any problem with the photo's.  I do live in North Dakota and have discovered that when the temps are below ten degrees Fahrenheit there is a lag on the auto-focus; everything seem to slow down.  That's OK, I have learned to adjust my picture taking - and I just keep the camera on the inside of my parka to keep it warm.  Great price + great product = happy customer!

Reviews.Title: Photos were bad, Panoramic feature was worse.
Reviews.Author: PeregrineSkye
Reviews.Content: When looking to buy my second-ever digital camera, I decided that the two most important things on my list were a camera capable of panorama, and one that took simple, but decent quality photos. I had this camera for about 15 minutes before I realized I was probably going to return it, though I continued to try it in different scenarios for two days in the hopes it might magically improve and be "the one."Pros:~ Good color variety~ Menu features are easy to navigate, with many optionsCons:~ If flash is not used/subject does not hold *perfectly* still, photos are blurry (even in a well-lit living room). This essentially means that, if you want to take photos during a group event/game night, you're going to be flashing everyone in the face or you'll have poor, blurry photos.~ Panorama feature is TERRIBLE. I took about 40 panoramic shots, both in- and outdoors. 37 of them had large gray sections in the final project, taking up between 25 and 50% of the picture. Additionally, all of the ones that included people distorted the features of the people.~ Here are a few of the pictures I took in the first night, examples of the above cons: imgur.com/a/ic4L7

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA!!!!!
Reviews.Author: R. Rogers
Reviews.Content: Takes wonderful pictures even in low light. Better than expected!!! If you are looking for a new camera this is the one. BIG quality in a small package. We were looking for a good quality camera and we found it. Great point and shoot unit. Priced right also. Shipping was quick and was packaged well.

Reviews.Title: Nikon CoolPix S6300 I love it!
Reviews.Author: Jean Phoenix
Reviews.Content: I noticed the speed with which this little and beautiful camera snaps a photo, it is so compact, and I enjoy it very much. I am glad I bought it at the price I did.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Stephen Berthold
Reviews.Content: Bought as a Christmas gift for a family member and was very well received  She thinks it is the nicest camera she has ever owned

Reviews.Title: Great little camera, lots of features and nice price.
Reviews.Author: Art Drew
Reviews.Content: This camera had more features than I was expecting. Some reviews said it didn't have a forced flash, but it does, its called fill flash. The one thing I have not gotten work well yet is video playback on my computer, but I may just have to play with the settings. I am using a class 10 SD card.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: AN
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the purchase, easy to use & takes great pictures. The product arrived quickly,  as stated.  Would recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix is Great
Reviews.Author: Melissa Willingham
Reviews.Content: Great product and pictures.  Easy to use.  I have really enjoyed this camera.  I would highly recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Jean Horton
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures.  Nice feature is the zoom. Then you have video as well and I do like the delay feature so I can get in some of the picture as well.

Reviews.Title: I would definitely recommend
Reviews.Author: Y R K Sundeep
Reviews.Content: For the price spent on it its really worth....  Only con i have noticed is that its taking time to get reset between snap to snap....

Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift and the person has been thrilled with it.
Reviews.Author: carolyn brown
Reviews.Content: The features on this camera are excellent.  Started taking pictures the minute it was received.  I had a 6100 and this 6300 is more than a step up it is great and the color is perfect for the receipient.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Katherine T.
Reviews.Content: It takes very nice pictures, actually better than I expected. I also love the selective color option and the other possibilities it offers me to enhance what I want to express in every picture I take.

Reviews.Title: I like it!!
Reviews.Author: Darla L Modlin
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera, I just wish it would have come with a card to hold more pics!! Great!!

Reviews.Title: Its cool
Reviews.Author: Manjunath P
Reviews.Content: Only drawback of Nikon coolpix S6300 is the back panel design, LCD buttons could have design could have been better..........Except this all the other features are great.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Tracy Espejo
Reviews.Content: It takes great pictures.  It has a great zoom as well.  The blue looks more purple than blue which is great for me.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: andrei
Reviews.Content: good item but not perfect pictures, very good making video and record sound and good battery very light and small

Reviews.Title: Incredible bargain!
Reviews.Author: AW28602
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased as a gift for or daughter. I had recently purchased one on sale from a retail chain for over twice the cost!  Camera arrived quickly and was exactly as described. Has been working great. Love the size and large number of settings and features of this camera! No complaints or concerns with this Amazon purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Ralph Milton Shoemaker
Reviews.Content: Have been using a Panasonic Lumax and find it hard to use in social settings. The Coolpix S6300 is so much easier to use and gives great pictures. I love the 10x zoom.

Reviews.Title: great camera♥♥♥
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I really love this camera, easy to use, fantastically clear pictures. If you are looking for a small, easy to use, sharp pictures, this is the one to buy.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Kodaq G.
Reviews.Content: Camera lives up to my expectations and looks cool too.  Movies are often too big to upload. The software is difficult to use so went back to iPhoto.

Reviews.Title: exactly what i was looking for
Reviews.Author: Duanne Biller
Reviews.Content: this camera is exactly what i was lookin for. its small and easy to carry around but still takes very good pics

Reviews.Title: Bought as a Birthday present
Reviews.Author: tim smith
Reviews.Content: This was a great gift. I am a Nikon user so it was easy to set up and explain the operation. very nice camera and great pictures for the price. Sure you could get better pictures from a more expensive camera, but for the price this one is easy to use and gives great results.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix S6300
Reviews.Author: GeoK
Reviews.Content: I like the camera very much.  As with most anything you buy, one has to define exactly what features mean  the most to you and then  make your purchase.  This camera meets all my needs and then some.  I like it very much and would recommend it for anyone to purchase.

Reviews.Title: Rating
Reviews.Author: Marty
Reviews.Content: I like the way it zooms but its kind of bulky. I would recommend this to any of my friends.

Reviews.Title: Good pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Tim Juhl
Reviews.Content: This camera is reasonably priced and loaded with features that make it quite a value for the price.  The name Nikon still means something.

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix s6300
Reviews.Author: Barb "Barb"
Reviews.Content: Love the color of the camera, the simplicity of its use.  Takes a nice clear shot and is still small enough to carry around at all times.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera good quality
Reviews.Author: Amable
Reviews.Content: This camera works really good and takes very goood pictures and has very good quality.The zoom is great. I used it for news years eve service at church and on my picture you could see the part in my hair and the boy took the picture from the very back row.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot camera.
Reviews.Author: Carolina Man
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a friend as a Christmas gift. This thing takes great pictures and is a breeze to operate. Nice job Nikon!

Reviews.Title: Incredible
Reviews.Author: Marshal White
Reviews.Content: This cameras is amazing with all of the many features it is still user friendly for the novice and the pictures are so vivid even the shots far away where you have to zoom in close and the camera sometimes Pixelate with this camera and its expansive zoom capabilities you don't have to worry about that. Great camera. My wife and I have not found any dislikes as of yet so if you are in the market for a god camera but don't want to spend a bundle this would be the camera to Look for!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera but takes terrible Macro Shots!
Reviews.Author: Kevin Raub "Tooled  Up"
Reviews.Content: Ok, I know that Point-And-Shoots are not made for perfect Macro photos, but my last Coolpix, the S6100, took closeups a hundred times better then this one! It hardly focuses up close and even far away zoomed in, it doesn't focus. Macro setting and all doesn't cut it. I am dissapointed with the Macro capability.As far as the rest of the camera, I would rate it 5 star! It has awesome, clear zoom and a light feel. The effects are really cool - especially the Selective Color and Painting, and it is very easy to use for beginners as well as proffesionals who just want a camera to carry around and pull out quick. I have to say that Coolpixes are not noted for durability, but this one has shown itself to be pretty cool on wear.Many people have complained about the short battery life, but the battery has been great for me! I hardly ever have to charge it -- maybe every 2 days at the least, and that is when I carry it around all the time and am almost constantly taking pictures.I would definitly recommend this camera to a friend... but I would make sure to tell them about the closeups!!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Mom of 5
Reviews.Content: This camera is great and my 16 year old daughter loves it.  There are many bells and whistles that she enjoys and has spent a lot of time discovering just what it can do.  I'm not very knowledgeable when it comes to cameras, but from what I can tell, this one is great.

Reviews.Title: Size Clarity Ease of use
Reviews.Author: Rajeh Gharzeddine
Reviews.Content: Very compact, light and handy. I love it! Pics are so crystal clear and full of color. Very easy to use - no complicated functions for non-pro picture takers.The zoom function is amazing too compared to the size.price is OK, but it misses the blue tooth or wireless connection to pc or smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Nikon
Reviews.Author: Miles Connell
Reviews.Content: A perfect little camera. It does all that I need it to do and has a lot of feautures that add to the fun of snapping photos. You can't go wrong with Nikon. Simply the best cameras in the business

Reviews.Title: very good camera
Reviews.Author: jim makins
Reviews.Content: very good little camera takes very good shots inside & out we had a kodak that will not stand up to this camera but not as good as our d3100 nikon

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Donald K.
Reviews.Content: Camera is very impresive, seems to be worth the price upgrade to get the quality.  Short term so far this camera has impressed and would recommend this camera, to any novice.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera!
Reviews.Author: martink
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my daughter. She wanted more megapixels and more zoom.. It delivered on that.. The high quality movies are great too. She was a little bummed when she discovered she had to charge the battery in the camera. That's minor though. I think it will just take getting used to. Overall, a great camera.

Reviews.Title: too bulky and heavy
Reviews.Author: joseph2221
Reviews.Content: rhis camera takes good pictures, but was too big and bulky. I was hoping it was smaller.  I am returning it and getting a sony cybershot. i love to take pictures but  hate carrying a camera around! i really wanted a cell phone size camera with a flash, and some digital zoom.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful, blue, and bionic
Reviews.Author: Sheryl Redman "spedteacher127"
Reviews.Content: I needed a nw camera and fell in love with this blue Nikon. It does everything I wanted a camera to do, and I can understand the directions so it was easy to set up and start taking pictures for the holidays!

Reviews.Title: Excellent for a small camera!
Reviews.Author: GAIL A. ROSS
Reviews.Content: Nice camera for the price.  I have used Nikon SLRs and  then the higher level Coolpix series when digital first came out.  This is my first 'aim and shoot' style camera. I just wanted to have the option of not carrying (and packing) a bulky camera when traveling, but still get some quality shots.  This one 'fits the bill' for me. The processor seems to be quick enough for a small camera, flash does well, and there are enough scene options to find what you need.  Overall a nice 'little' camera.An added note: after reading another review about the battery....my battery has been exceptional, though I am used to recharging often on my bigger camera and didn't really know what to expect, I've gone through the holidays and taken many shots and the battery still shows a full charge.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S6300
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: Received this camera on time and it has been working well so far. I am very impressed with the quality of the photos that it produces.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: linzybug
Reviews.Content: Fast delivery, brand new and it was exactly what I wanted. I was afraid it might come slow because it was getting closer to Christmas but it was perfect.

Reviews.Title: Amazing.
Reviews.Author: Donald Zlabinger
Reviews.Content: Very cool, and Slick looking camera.  Takes amazing pictures and with 16 MP you can make anything look great.  I love the 10 x zoom.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Kelly Claxton
Reviews.Content: this camera is great! easy to set up. the pictures have great quality. price was great. highly recommend to other consumers.

Reviews.Title: Cool little camera
Reviews.Author: Tony J.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for my Mom. She's been using it and says it's great. The only thing that concerned me was that it felt really flimsy when I first picked it up. Other than that, the camera is great for the price.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix s6300 16 mp camera
Reviews.Author: 0TechSavvy
Reviews.Content: The camera is very small.  It fits into a pocket or a purse very easily.  The photos come out clear. The zoom is fantastic.  My 9 year old granddaughter took some amazing photos!  Well worth it. I bought it from Amazon.  It came earlier than suggested which was a bonus!  I'm thinking about replacing the Canon I bought myself last summer with this camera.  The zoom isn't the same as the Canon but I can't hardly tell the difference. And, the Canon is so much bigger & heavier!  Of course, I'll get myself the red one too!  Nice camera!

Reviews.Title: Do not Buy
Reviews.Author: Monica
Reviews.Content: I used charged the battery and used the camera once.  About a week later I was going to use it again and it was dead - I charged it for 4 hours (the amount of time it said to in the book that came with the camera).  The green "charging light was flashing as if it was charging but the camera would not turn on.  It would not do anything.  I charged it for 10 more hours to no avail.  I called Nokia and they told me to try to charge it hooked up to my computer instead of the wall outlet so I tried it - same thing.  It appears to be charging but it never stops blinking and it will not power on.  It could just be the battery, it comes with a Lithiom ion rechargeable but I do not want to have to buy a new battery for a brand new camera.  I am sad because I have always had Nikon cameras and now I want to buy a different brand :(

Reviews.Title: Good Pick
Reviews.Author: Anthony Baran
Reviews.Content: Selected this camera for our daughter.  She was very pleased with the selection and surprised by some of the things the camera can do.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: L. cohen
Reviews.Content: just getting to know my camera , as santa brought it , so far so good . small and light . pics look good !

Reviews.Title: This was a gift
Reviews.Author: Beth Cruz
Reviews.Content: Bought for my daughter and husband and they love it. Liked that the battery was charged and ready to go Christmas morning.

Reviews.Title: Will not focus, captures either too bright or dark, flash not reliable.
Reviews.Author: Kennedy
Reviews.Content: Had hopes for this camera for Christmas Day with the kids. We were very disappointed with this camera for the following reasons:1. Flash was not reliable; one shot it would fire and be way too bright, the next shot it would fire and be too dark, the third shot it would not even fire.2. Even after adjusting the settings, the camera would not take clear shots. Shots were blurry even if the subject was still.3. The photos were consistently either too bright or too dark. (And all settings were played with to attempt to achieve the correct WB, ISO...etc.)4. After only one morning of (attempted) use, the camera locked up and the battery had to be removed to reset it. (Happened 2x within 2 hours of use.)5. Camera felt light, cheap and was bulkier/larger than my old 10mp camera I owned years ago.5. This is not a paid review. Thank you, Amazon for allowing paid (fake) reviews.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Pablo Jolly
Reviews.Content: .Great relationship cost - product . A lot of edition software effects provided within the camera, no PC required to get great picture effects!

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: adrian aguilera
Reviews.Content: good muy bueno el producto estamos trvajando e ello buena antrega  pa ra my le pongo 5 estrellas bue vendedor

Reviews.Title: Worth for Money
Reviews.Author: Praveen
Reviews.Content: Daylight it is awesome, but at night it is poor. Auto Focus could have been better. Video recording is good in 1080p.

Reviews.Title: CoolPixS6300
Reviews.Author: Monkeysfather
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect for the intended use. The only problem is that it will not focus when in full zoom on items closer than five feet away.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Sugrim Mungal
Reviews.Content: Very good camera for point and shoot pictures. Neat and small can carry any where. the range is not to good but i dont need it so it is perfect for me.

Reviews.Title: COOLPIX S6300
Reviews.Author: Judith Constantine "Judy C"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera primarily for zooming in on wildlife for reference photos for my painting.  I like how small it is and how good a picture it takes.  I don't like that I have to press the ON button twice for it to turn on.  All in all, it was worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera.  It's small, light weight and takes great pictures.  Very easy to operate.  Oh course you can never go wrong with a Nikon camera.  They are by far the best!

Reviews.Title: Poor quality camera, poor customer service from Nikon
Reviews.Author: K. Weakliem "KG"
Reviews.Content: This camera lasted me 10 months before it stopped working completely. I love to take pictures and would use it often and treat it with care. It has been inconsistent in its quality after the first few months, short batter life, inconsistent focusing. The touch screen was nice but that was about it. I sent it in for the 1 year warranty repair and Nikon wanted to charge me $120 for fix it because the USB port was easy to damage, due to poor quality of design, and therefore it voided the warranty. Nikon will not repair any of it whether it is covered under warranty or not because the USB port does not work. I will never own a Nikon camera again after this experience!

Reviews.Title: hate it
Reviews.Author: Marina Sakhno Gill
Reviews.Content: Zoom is not stable enough to shoot decent picture or film.  Auto settings produce blurry shots a lot of the time.  I thought I bought something easy to use, instead I need a course on setting adjustments.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Daniel Kolb
Reviews.Content: great little camera; very efficient; nice new upgrade from our previous coolpix camera; service was great; very satisfied; would recommend it to anyone interested in a good camera

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S6300
Reviews.Author: CNSIII
Reviews.Content: Overall Camera is great so far.  One thing I missed in the description is it takes a special battery, not AA as I expected.  I orderd extra to have power available when the battery is exhausted, but Just somethingt o be aware of.  The 10x Zoom is great for such a small camera.  Lots of neat filtering and features.  Happy with it so far.

Reviews.Title: A bit confused
Reviews.Author: nirvanaa
Reviews.Content: I got my package on time, with two other  items I had ordered within the Amazon Box. The Nikon S6300 within the box came with its own box, which was not sealed, neither were the accessories that came with the camera, the camera itself was not sealed and there were no screen protecting skin or wrap on the LCD display, like most new cameras have, I am now wondering if I got an open box, or a returned item. I got it as a christmas gift, Its now wrapped and under the  christmas tree, so I am not in a position to return the item, I will just have to wait and see if it is all good after christmas. Did I get a open box, or returned item or a refurbished piece, Amazon??  I am giving it three stars for now - one for Amazon's timely delivery, one to Nikon, because Nikon products are mostly good, and one because its christmas!

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix
Reviews.Author: dolly
Reviews.Content: camera, i like nikon cameras i have one myself it was on my granddaughters christmas list,i gave it as a gift i know they will love it and i like that it has a rechargeable battery rather than using AA batteries so it make my expectations

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Judith Brandt
Reviews.Content: Great camera love the red colorGreat size and easy to hold and to focus. Takes great pictures.Love it.

Reviews.Title: excellent!!!!
Reviews.Author: brittany
Reviews.Content: Great camera!!! Great price...glad I made the purchase zoom is great...was perfect for a trip to mexico!!! Battery life is very long

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Urbowicz
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera for the price. Easy to use,takes great pictures and is super compact. I carry the camera with me on my belt every day to capture images that I would otherwise miss with my larger DSLR camera. I would recommend this camera to anyone wanting a small point and shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: Good thing in a small package!
Reviews.Author: John E Hebbeln
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use has high quality image and important to me, it fits in my shirt pocket. I thought I would have trouble moving the images to my computer, but not a problem just removed the memory card inserted in slot in computer and a prompt came up asking where I wanted to store the images, I sent them to picassa where I could remove "redeye" and do other editing. I would recomend this camera to anyone like me who is not a pro and wants moderatly priced camera that takes high quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpic S6300
Reviews.Author: Caroline A Cartwright
Reviews.Content: Just received this and love it already I just have to read up on all the wonderful features it has to offer, it's been 15 years since I had a new camera so I really needed to get updated and this camera certainly does that.  Looking forward to using at Christmas when all the family is here, it is so compact I can keep it in my purse to use whenever I need it,

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Susan L White
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a very easy to use camera.  This is very user friendly.  Easy to navigate to all menu choices.  Very good picture quality as well.

Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: Rozo A. "A beautiful wind."
Reviews.Content: The quality is good, I semi wish there was an easy way to make the file sizes smaller. I'll just buy a bigger hard drive. I don't get to take pictures as much as I used to but this comes in handy until I buy an SLR.The HD is excellent. The zoom is even better.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Nathan Rodgers
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera for the price. My mom will love the color and love how easy it is to use.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: katt7482
Reviews.Content: You just can't get a small camera with the picture quality and zoom like this one for such a great price!! I was so impressed with the camera, which I got super fast, I'm thinking about getting one for my mom. It's small and perfect to put in your purse or pocket. I will say, the blue looks more purple, but I still love the color.

Reviews.Title: cool nikon
Reviews.Author: Jerald Rickey
Reviews.Content: I really like all of the new features that this new camera has especially the ability to take pictures in low light without the flash.

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix
Reviews.Author: woody2x4
Reviews.Content: Met all expectationsEven my wife was able to use itOn time deliveryVery happyVery easy to useLots of features

Reviews.Title: Coool!
Reviews.Author: Terry Fisher
Reviews.Content: Excellent product.  This small sized camera does the job of the larger cameras without the extra bulkyness.  It fits into pocket or purse.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Very versatile and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Frances A. Hrabak
Reviews.Content: The Nikon s6300 has many scene options including sepia giving an old time camera finish.  The fill flash is easy to set up.  The low light ability is amazing.  Photo clarity is Nikon good.  Only problem is the CD for adjusting raw images, Nikon 2, was not functional.  Maybe Amazon will help?

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Baski
Reviews.Content: I have been using SLR in recent years, I bought this camera as a gift for my uncle.This is a perfect point and shoot camera.It has perfect auto-focus and also has plenty of other settings.The flash is good enough for indoor photographs. I would recommend it for sure.

Reviews.Title: Nikon CoolPIX S6300
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Received this camera from Amazon and it was just great...until I played back the 1080 HD video and noticed some white spots on the image.  I called Amazon and promptly got through to a person who gave me a tech support number for Nikon.  Nikon told me to try playing it back on another screen and if I got the same result it was a problem with the camera.  So I quickly got another call through to Amazon and they immediately sent a replacement camera, expedited the shipping at no charge and I will have a new camera in 2 days.  So I will update this review when I get the new camera.  Has anyone else had a similar problem with Nikon sensors?  This camera was made in China.I really like the fact that it has full HD, and it contains a mini-HD outlet on the camera.  The stereo sound is great on it, too.

Reviews.Title: worth every penny
Reviews.Author: Rachel Allen "razladybug"
Reviews.Content: I splurged on this camera before a cruise last month and I'm SO HAPPY I did.  I mainly was drawn in by the CMOS sensor and the speed of the camera - have 2 children...  And it did not disappoint.  This is the first point and shoot since my old old 4300 that I have been happy with.  I have had Nikons for a long time and this is prob my 5th or 6th p&s; from them.  I have a habit of dropping them in toilets...  running them over in my van... :)  So I have been SUPER careful with this one cuz I LOVE it.  The quality is great, the features are great - really like the panorama mode.  I had a lot of fun with this camera.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Gregory C
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera, takes excellent shots, keep in mind settings-kinda like a dslr. I bought it for my wife, she goes to soccer games with grandson. Nice pictures. Yes, I would recommend this camera. Small, lightweight..

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it!
Reviews.Author: sailing nance
Reviews.Content: Displays should not just break while being carried in a case and inside a bag. Evidently they are terribly fragile. DON'T buy this camera! NIKON gets a really good deal as they make you pay as much to repair the broken screen as the camera cost to begin with! Took blurry pictures 85% of the time anyway. What a waste of money!

Reviews.Title: Coolpix
Reviews.Author: D. S. Woodhouse "Grandma"
Reviews.Content: Wanted something that was easy as the Coolpix I bought several years ago, but wanted some advanced features, most of all something that could correct my shaky hands and/or blurry pictures. Haven't had success in these things. Am just starting to read about all the settings, though I didn't expect such a complex camera. Esp since the font of the instructions are so small. Would probably not have  bought this if I had known I had to make so many choices.

Reviews.Title: Will not close-up or Macro focus/ Poor service after the sale
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: Review UPDATE: As of May 9 2013, Camera was returned from Nikon service with a note that "Camera was tested and found to be working correctly. If trying to take close-up pictures to change the camera to the Macro mode." AUGHHH!!! Had to call Nikon again because that is the reason I sent it in for repairs. CAMERA DOES NOT FOCUS IN THE MACRO MODE. WILL NOT EVEN ALLOW THE SHUTTER TO BE PRESSED because the camera will not focus. Simply put...the camera is defective. I received the camera back on May 2nd 2013 and phoned right away to let them know it was not working. They promised to send shipping labels ASAP. 5 CALLS LATER I STILL DON'T HAVE THE SHIPPING LABLES. Phoned again today and am to have the labels by 8pm tonight. Amazing, they can send me emails with promotions of stuff to purchase all day long yet can't get a return label out to me.Shipping this camera back today April 17th 2013. New fresh out of the box defective camera, will not close-up or macro focus. Have tried everything even handing it to someone else along with the instruction book to let them give it a try. Last person gave it a go for a good amount of time, finally said it is a bit of junk take it back. Followed the instruction book lined up everything and had the green lights flashing as noted in the instruction book yet it still would not focus. I don't know if it is just this one camera but wanted to ad my 2 cents worth incase there is others out there experiencing the same problems. I have been carrying around two cameras to the job, my old one for close-ups and the 6300 for all other pictures. Finally came to the conclusion that the camera is the problem.I have been using cameras for about 40 years so I have just a bit of experience with them.Aside from the above mentioned problem I would say this is a good camera.

Reviews.Title: Returned before I had a chance to use
Reviews.Author: Jan Kelly
Reviews.Content: I can't comment on the function, but I have two other Nikon Coolpix cameras and love them.  I bought this one as a gift and returned it only because the blue looked more purple than blue, and different parts of the camera didn't match in color - part "purple" and part blue.  That made for embarrassment at Christmas when my daughter unwrapped it.  Looked like a factory second.

Reviews.Title: Worst possible camera
Reviews.Author: Ajaykarthi
Reviews.Content: This is worst camera i have, i had previously nikon coolpix s3300 which was really good one.The image stabilization is totally a nonsense in this.At very bright light or lower lights your photos does not comes fine.Auto mode is not so good as of Sony Digital camera.Personal opinion is dont go for this.I had bought this for 179$ now this is 119$ in amazon, you can understand why this much difference in 5 months.

Reviews.Title: Crap
Reviews.Author: TrueMe "CapitalTen"
Reviews.Content: Horrible results.  The worst Nikon product I have owned.  Ended up returning and buying a Canon 110HS - plus the poorly made.  You can see, feel the cheap plastic that is used as its body frame.

Reviews.Title: I would give it no stars if I could
Reviews.Author: C. Gallmeyer
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after my son dropped my Canon G9.  It is absolutely the worst camera I have ever owned.  I have yet to take a single quality picture with it.  They all end up blurry.  I have played with all of the settings and I'm just done with it.  It also decides when it wants to cut on and when it wants to take pictures.  I will focus the camera and try to press the button to take the picture, only to have it do nothing.  The camera also ended up with a dead pixel in the LCD screen a little after a week of owning it.  I am now using my old Kodak camera from early 2000... at least it takes clear pictures.  I will be checking out amazon for another G9 (it was nearly impossible to take a bad picture with it).

Reviews.Title: not so good
Reviews.Author: Swapnil
Reviews.Content: I wont say its even a so-so camera....real disappointment. the LCD screen is blur and you will never know how the picture u clicked would turn out. Not so sleek either. Only the price is attractive.

Reviews.Title: LEMON Battery, decent camera
Reviews.Author: Kathi "Kayaks"
Reviews.Content: Adding on to my review once again, and adding a star, too. The second battery is holding up OK, and I am used to the camera. But, if I had known there was a wifi version to be released  so soon, I would have waited a couple months and purchased that one instead.I'm adding to my original review below. While I am not thrilled with this camera I'm relatively sure the problem was the battery that the camera shipped with.  I am still having a problem with the camera deleting images that I intended to keep, and don't find the controls intuitive; perhaps if I used the camera daily I would begin to remember how to navigate, but I am finding the menu frustrating. Wish I had not purchased it online.Original review: The coolpix worked fine the first 2 times I used it. A couple months went by (with the camera safely stored in my home) and I tried to use the camera yesterday - I got the message that the battery was exhausted.  I charged the battery per the instructions in the manual and now the camera will not even turn on! I reviewed the charge procedure and I had not made any errors.  I then tried to set up a return since it is totally USELESS if the brand new battery will not charge. Amazon's return window expired a month after I got the camera.  What's with that? So I guess I am stuck. I researched cameras in this price range carefully before I made a decision.  I obviously made the WRONG decision and bought it from the WRONG supplier.  The heck with you, Amazon.  You're driving this customer away by not offering any other options for replacement.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: MrsBellaire
Reviews.Content: The color is more like a purple than a blue. It's cool though because I love purple. Came in the box. Not sure if brand new since there was no film covering the screen on the back. Love the camera

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: devudoo
Reviews.Content: Best bang for the buck camera! Not big money but big value. Specifically great zoom, good pic save speeds vs my old camera, and panoramic photos

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix Worst Camera
Reviews.Author: Ankit
Reviews.Content: Camera picture quality is not good at all. Very less feature and in night mode, it does not take good picture.Worst thing is movie recording. When I recorded a movie and later saw it, then found that only audio part is clear. Video hangs in between for all the movie clips i recorded. I will never prefer this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Display cracke d for no reason
Reviews.Author: Kay Gore
Reviews.Content: I had only used the camera once & stored it in a drawer in its case.  When I went to use it in December, the display appeared cracked. and is unusable.  I had purchased SquareTrade for the camera but it does not cover the cracked LCD screen although I did nothing to the camera that would have resulted in the screen cracking.  I purchased a Canon camera to replace the Coolpix S6300.  The Canon has been dragged across India, Peru, Ecuador (the Galapagos), Chile, etc. for months, dropped, and experienced extreme weather--but keeps working.  If you buy this camera (Coolpix S6300) be sure to buy accident insurance even if no accident causes the screen to crack, you need accident insurance to get it fixed.  Better yet, buy a Canon camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera.
Reviews.Author: Dana Dubnicka
Reviews.Content: Still learning all this camera does,but very happy with it so far.Wanted small, yet powerful. The 10 x's optical zoom is great.

Reviews.Title: Frrrrrragile!!
Reviews.Author: AS
Reviews.Content: The very first day after I bought the camera it announced "LENSE ERROR", and never worked again. So back to the dealer, as Nikon proposes a 7 day exchange warranty. The dealer refused to comply. So the the Nikon service center, who did not succeed to convince the dealer either. So the service denter exchanged the camera, unfortunately only black available. This is 2 weeks ago. I treat the camera as if it were made of crystal,it just does not feel solid. As for the pictures, ok in good conditions, no more. Definitely poor in SPORTS scene and low light.

Reviews.Title: WARNING!!
Reviews.Author: theSweetPea23
Reviews.Content: Just giving this a 2 star because it is So heavy! Wanted a small, Lightweight, camera to carry in my bag. I've Never taken a pic with the camera, because I've Never carried the camera!! Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Nice Cam but worst Package
Reviews.Author: Wagdt
Reviews.Content: Sorry, my new Cam scratched when packed out because the package is so difficult to unpack, be careful when you try to unpack.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality for price
Reviews.Author: April Lynn Walsh
Reviews.Content: The camera was okay for a few months and then started freezing up all the time and taking blurry pictures Amazon would only let us return if within 30 days

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix s6300
Reviews.Author: marshamarshamarsha
Reviews.Content: I have never been as disappointed in a Nikon product as I am with this camera.For the most part, it refuses to focus on anything I need a close-up of (the images are blurry in the viewfinder, and the photos are blurred as well).  I tried to photograph a piece of jewelry and it took over 20 minutes to get an acceptable picture.  The zoom zooms, but it won't focus either.  I bought this camera because I had the same problem with my s8000 -- but it's over 10,000 photos old, and I thought the problem might be age-related.If you want a photo of something in the distance and you're not particular about close-up detail, this will probably be a good camera for you.

Reviews.Title: Love my CoolPix
Reviews.Author: morris carver
Reviews.Content: Haven't used the camera but about a month, but, so far, like the results very much.  Still trying to understand the features.

Reviews.Title: Not even worth as a free gift!
Reviews.Author: Anand Balaraman
Reviews.Content: Extremely slow response and more than 50% of the pictures are out of focus and even that remining 50% is not a very good quality. My cell phone camera takes better pictures than this. Just go away from this product. May be the other models of Nikon are good. But this one sucks.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Nancy Wilkinson
Reviews.Content: And it fits into my pocket when I am traveling and don't want to be weighted down with a larger camera.

Reviews.Title: Very nice look and quality
Reviews.Author: G. Miller
Reviews.Content: i bought it for a friend and she is sooooooo in love with it. she takes it everywhere and doesnt allow anyone to "hold it"....lol. great pics and she like the red.

Reviews.Title: Great for your first camera ever
Reviews.Author: Dimeadozen
Reviews.Content: This camera was to replace a 6 year old Canon Elph IS700 (6 mp, terrible video, 4x zoom). Unfortunately, the Nikon is unable to find focus when using the zoom past 6x for still photos and is constantly loosing focus on video recordings. The daylight shots outside are poorer than the Canon, and the photos on the Nikon in anything short of ideal conditions are worse than any current smart phone. I was excited to have a new better camera with 1080p video, but this is not going to be the one.Pros:lighteasy to navigate menusquick photo/video switching10x zoomCon:poor/slow focusbad photo qualityworse video qualityno ability to zoom in on previously taken photos to check if they are blurry (which is likely)This is a great camera if you do not expect to have a usable photo every time or it is your very first camera.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Vicky M. Sand
Reviews.Content: bought this as a gift for christmas and haven't seen pictures from it yet.  I know lots were taken so soon I hope to receive them which will give me a better idea as to the value.

Reviews.Title: Defective??
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This is the first Nikon failure I've encountered going back to the days of film.  The unit's display indicates battery exhausted after one or two still pics.  I even tried a second genuine Nikon battery with and separate charger and SD cards.  Caveat Emptor!!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price -- pictures are blurry
Reviews.Author: MARS from LA
Reviews.Content: Great for the price, but anytime one says great for the price they are consoling themselves for not having paid more for better product.  Blurry pictures -- use sporting event mode it will provide less blurr.

Reviews.Title: too early to tell
Reviews.Author: Little Debbie
Reviews.Content: We are still trying to figure out all the settings, but the general picture taking isn't as good a quality as our canon so far. I'll keep working with it. There are some nice features that are worth it.

Reviews.Title: DONT LISTEN TO BAD REVIEWS!!!!
Reviews.Author: Philip Johnson
Reviews.Content: pictures are perfect.  zoom is great.  lens so far so good after 2 months, obviously you have to TAKE GOOD CARE of a lens that gets a 3 inch erection from a tiny camera body lol.  my boyfriend spends about 20 minutes photoshopping all the pics he takes and they end up looking quite professional IMO.  highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal for the money.
Reviews.Author: Cory Carpenter
Reviews.Content: The pictures that came out nicely, came out really nice.  I did run into a few situations where it would go on a bad streak, but it was rare.  Did an exceptional job in ultra-low light situations.
