Reviews.Title: Nikon coopix S6300 16 MP
Reviews.Author: Musicman
Reviews.Content: What a great camera, I'm completely satisfied. I love all the features  on the camera. Takes beautiful pictures. Keep up the good work.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S6300 is not worth a penny
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Nikon COOLPIX S6300 16 MP Digital Camera with 10x Zoom NIKKOR Glass Lens and Full HD 1080p Video (Silver)This is one of the worst cameras I have ever had. I have had to send it into the factory because the flash goes out and no longer functions. My Brownie from years ago works better than this piece of junk does. They are telling us this time that I have the wrong memory card for it but it has the memory card that came with it. Now it is out of warranty and cannot be fixed any more. I would never recommend this to anyone. I would not even give it one star because it is worth nothing when you cannot even take a decent picture.knitnlady

Reviews.Title: the only good think about this camera is the color
Reviews.Author: K Snowden "jsnow"
Reviews.Content: this camera has the worst picture quality and does not zoom to capture a close up at all.  I thought it was that the camera was broken, so I sent it into the company to fix it.  I just got it back today and it's the exact same.  I can not use it for work at all.  I'm so disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Images poor quality...
Reviews.Author: Gabriel
Reviews.Content: I don't know why it says HD or 16 MP because the images of this cameras sucks!!The focus is all wrong and the has bad contrast....

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Bonnie K. Eichelberger
Reviews.Content: This is the best Camera I have owned and believe me I have owned several.  I print all my pictures at home and the pictures are great.  It is easy to use and you don't have to charge is every time you use it.  I would recommend this for anyone who wants a small, easy to use Camera.Nikon COOLPIX L26 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 5x Zoom NIKKOR Glass Lens and 3-inch LCD (Silver)

Reviews.Title: Highly recommended
Reviews.Author: JOHN L
Reviews.Content: I took it to the golf course and took the video of swings.  Looked great on my HD TV screen.  Panorama view picture worked great too.  Strongly recommend to buy.  Reason for giving only four is that it goes sometimes blurry with auto focus mode.

Reviews.Title: Its, Not What I Expected Really
Reviews.Author: Vinh Pham
Reviews.Content: I bought this because a lot of people wrote a review on this and they were all 5 stars. I really like it. But except the face that it is really thick and the screen where you see the photos is small. The quality and pictures are every detailed. I really like this but its too thick for me and the screen is too small for me. I would like it better with a wider screen and if it was thinner. Its light though.

Reviews.Title: Way thicker than expected
Reviews.Author: Steve Danke
Reviews.Content: I am buying about 1 of those pocket cameras a year and usually go with one of the top models.This one I purchased for family and did not do my usually thorough research (including checking it out in stores :) ).So when it arrived I was floored at how clunky it looked. It is way thicker than I expected from the pictures.Seems fine otherwise, even though they have to stop upping the mega pixels on these things to oblivion. I know professional photographers who stick with 12 MP (admittedly RAW), so why does grandpa think he needs 16 or 20 MP to shoot little one tearing-up the birthday presents.I realize that I cannot speak for picture quality as this one was a present for someone else, but other reviewers already provided good information around that.

Reviews.Title: Worst Camera Ever
Reviews.Author: Patricia M. Passaretti
Reviews.Content: This us the worst camera I've ever owned and I've only had it for one month.  It turns itself on while it's in the case so the battery dies before I can even use it.  It takes terrible pictures when it's on automatic.  I'm so disappointed that my photos came out so bad.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY NIKON
Reviews.Author: Ran Rubin
Reviews.Content: i treat my stuff respectfully and with care. this NIKON fell from my hand from 50 cm of the ground. the piece of S*** broke down. warranty does not apply. i can promise you that the fall was not serius and a product should be able to recover from a fall like that.DO NOT BUY NIKON

Reviews.Title: Still wanted what I ordered RED
Reviews.Author: Dorothy McCay
Reviews.Content: When I recieved the camera it wasn't red but silver in color.  Made me mad because of the posting was outdated they told me. And because the camera needed to be used right away and was a gift I couldn't send it back.  So I talked to the distributer and he sent me a battery and memory card to make me happy.  Hes called and sent emails to get me to send a nice review to you but I haven't done what hes wanted, because I don't really have what I ordered.....

Reviews.Title: Coolpix s6400 got warm and split at top shutter button
Reviews.Author: IEshifter
Reviews.Content: Used the camera just a few times purchased for Christmas present and really liked the programing features, but the first real use was at a military ball where it was darker than normal and most of the pictures were a blur.  So tried to video and that killed the battery in a few minutes with what i thought was excessive heat to the back of the camera. The camera was side lined for some time where my daughter and i tried to get the hang of how to make it work better but the battery died very quickly in video mode.  the camera got warm and later we discovered the camera case split open by shutter button.  first and last Nikon

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: DBA
Reviews.Content: This is a good product at a reasonable price.  I shoot with a SLR but take this one on trips when space is limited and it functions nicely.

Reviews.Title: returned
Reviews.Author: XYZ
Reviews.Content: i just dont like it, i will write pro and con real quick.pro: sharp pic (if AF successfully) , nice video, 10x zoom.con: HORRIBLE AF, take blurry pics most of time. unbelievably bad micro mode(cant really get close...) .have to put battery inside the camera in order to charge (someone ppl consider it as a plus? i dunno).  thick size.i bought this to replace my lose canon 780is and i found this one cant really work well. returned after 2 hr testing. well i may have to say it is my own problems cause there are a lot of 5 stars review.

Reviews.Title: Camera Color
Reviews.Author: Jodi
Reviews.Content: Nikon COOLPIX S6300 16 MP Digital Camera with 10x Zoom NIKKOR Glass Lens and Full HD 1080p Video (Blue)The Nikon Coolpix S6300 does take great pictures and seems easy to use. The blue color is weird. Just be aware that when you buy a blue one, it really is part purple and part blue. Since this camera is not sold in purple, it must be in the coloring process. I do not think I would have bought it had I seen it first. The front is one color and the back is another. I was very disappointed as I wanted blue, not blue and purple!

Reviews.Title: Very disappointing :(
Reviews.Author: Kristin
Reviews.Content: I have just recently became interested in photography after using my parents wonderful canon SLR and decided to begin looking for a point and shoot of my own, so naturally, I began looking for canons. Most of the canons I wanted were overly priced and the older ones had bad reviews so I began widening my search by looking for nikons whitch was hard for me because I had never used one and didn't have trust in the brand. But after much searching I finally decided to splurge and get the s6300. It had the most decent reviews and also left me with no choice to keep looking because I was going to washington dc soon, therefore putting it to the ultimate test. The camera arrived (finally) the day we departed for the capital.When it arrived, The minute I put my hands on the camera I was disappointed. For a newly released camera , this one was way to big and chunky, and the screen was tiny. But I told myself that I bought the camera to take pictures, not just hold it. When I took my first pic, it was of my cat at full zoom to test it out. I was pleased to see that the image quality was better than I thought.We stopped at Monticello before dc and the second I pulled out my s6300 to shoot a pic of a Thomas Jefferson statue, the camera turned on but the screen was blanc. I was surprised at how short the battery life was because I assumed it was low, even though it said it was fully charged. So I hagan charging it But it did no good. when we got to our hotel I burnt countless minuets and hours of charging and trying hard to find a solution but I gave up. I. Can't explain how frustrating it is to go on vacation to dc and return with no documentation of the trip of my own. All I have to say is that I will never buy another Nikon again, nor will I return this one and get a new one.Thanks a lot Nikon :P  Please, don't buy this camera. There's a reason why it's so cheap.

Reviews.Title: a very bad deal
Reviews.Author: ROY
Reviews.Content: I bought Nikon COOLPIX S6300 16 MP Digital Camera with 10NIKKOR Glass Lens. But, when the camera was sent to me. I felt so sad. Which is  Nikon COOLPIX S6100 with 7x Zoom, a cheaper and used and damaged one. I hate that.Here, I must thank the amazon custom service, they are so kind and try to make up my lost, and return refund to me. But, I still have spent two days to deal with it, and contact my friends to help me. I also have to return the other things I bought about this camera. So sad.I hope this thing never happen to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Mabelle Minter
Reviews.Content: Haven't really used it enough to get acquainted but  I think it is going to be just what I want.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Lady
Reviews.Content: I love this camera; it's compact and easy to use; great value for the money! Would defo recommend this and purchase this item again!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: rdllink
Reviews.Content: I really do like this camera, it is allot better than my older Olympus. It's zoom is quite better than my older camera. The only fault is I'm not real happy with the smaller window on the viewfinder, I was happier with the 3 inch screen. I would highly recommend this camera in its price range. It shoots very good pictures and video playback is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Nikon S6300
Reviews.Author: fletch
Reviews.Content: Great camera!! Was shipped super fast and when it came it didn't disappoint me. Takes AMAZING pictures with great detail. Easily the best camera I have ever owned and I have had quite a few. I would deffinently recommend it to anyone and the price was not bad at all! Five Stars!!!

Reviews.Title: Not happy, Returned this Camera
Reviews.Author: Ryan R.
Reviews.Content: For a budget camera I thought I was getting a good camera but it is a POS for a Nikon Product.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Leonard
Reviews.Content: It has a Gazillion features now all I have to do is become tech Savvy. I still love it though.

Reviews.Title: Does not take HD High Quality Pics...
Reviews.Author: guy
Reviews.Content: Camera is cheap...it feels cheap when you hold it.  Pics don't turn out all that "HD High Quality."  They turn out....ok.  HD movie mode does allow you to zoom while recording, and the 10x optical zoom is very powerful.  But if you're looking to take high resolution pics....this camera DOES NOT TAKE HIGH RESOLUTION HD PICS....I think I'm going to return it.

Reviews.Title: No complaints so far
Reviews.Author: Robert Mcerlain
Reviews.Content: Bought this item for my wife who loves to take pictures, but she seems unimpressed.  Have to chalk that up to the fact that it is still a new camera to her.  Believe she will appreciate it more as you uses it more and experiences the results.

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy Coolpix
Reviews.Author: PenName "StephAnie"
Reviews.Content: I am sad to say that I have wasted a huge sum of money on this camera. The camera is very small and very cheaply made with a plastic feel to it. The absolute worst is that it is not compatible with MacIntosh computers or iPhoto. You have to waste a half an hour downloading a special Nikon software, and even then it will not recognize a connection with a USB cable!! In fact, it's even stated in the user's manual: "Connecting The USB Cable: The connection may not be recognized if the camera is connected to the computer via a USB hub." WHAT?! Isn't that the primary purpose of a digital camera - to be able to connect it to a computer and simply upload the photos?Please be warned: THIS CAMERA IS A HUGE WASTE OF MONEY. Run don't walk away from Coolpix. If you look online, people have written about all sorts of models numbers under this brand and they all have trouble simply uploading photos. Ridiculous.Another negative is that the Nikon "help line" has a constant busy signal. A help line with a busy signal? Really? If I could give minus stars on this product, I would.

Reviews.Title: simple camera
Reviews.Author: an a
Reviews.Content: I thought since this was a 2012 model that it would have a lot of features and would be modern but no this seems like a simple camera i would expect from years ago. I do not like the buttons or the screen it seems like a basic junk camera, i dont like that its not a touchscreen. The  pictures were clear at first then the color just don't look right, whenever i take a pic it looks foggy and dim not at all what i expected for a 2012 model maybe for  2002 it looks modern but the functions are old seems like a junky camera.UPDATE: This camera took horrible pictures outside, they were super dark. i could not get the lighting good on the pictures, but you just have to keep playing with the settings to get it right, also the delete all option is so easy to hit by mistake it deleted all my pictures that i could not get back i dont like that at all. but after i played with the settings i found it does take some pretty good pictures with alot of detail.
